New Records: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest international goal after seven seconds.
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest international goal after seven seconds.
Kylian Mbappé forced a fine save from Germany's Marc-André ter Stegen in the 26th minute.
Kai Havertz scored Germany's second goal early in the second half.
Pre-Game Insights: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann was desperate for a good start to the year ahead of the tournament on home soil in June.
Post-Match Reflections: Germany's Nagelsmann expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and the confidence boost from the game.
France coach Didier Deschamps acknowledged the team's poor performance and took responsibility for the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Groupama Stadium in Lyon, France, with an attendance of 56,000.
This was Didier Deschamps' 150th game in charge of the French national team.
